trained using.from sentence: The models are trained using Adam [20] with hyperparameters selected on development set.

on.from sentence: We chose two one-layer LSTM for read/write modules on the tasks other than QA on which we used two-layer LSTM.

word embeddings: pre-trained 300-D Glove 840B vectors and 100-D Glove 6B vectors

word embeddings.from sentence: The pre-trained 300-D Glove 840B vectors and 100-D Glove 6B vectors [21] were obtained for the word embeddings.

crop or pad.from sentence: We crop or pad the input sequence to a fixed length.

regularized by.from sentence: The models were regularized by using dropouts and an l2 weight decay.
